member.name: T:OFIQ.OFIQEngine
member.summary: Main entry point for the OFIQ facial image quality assessment library.

member.name: M:OFIQ.OFIQEngine.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:OFIQ.OFIQEngine.Initialize(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the OFIQ engine with the specified configuration.
member.param: The directory containing the configuration file.
The name of the configuration file (default: "ofiq_config.jaxn").
member.exception: Thrown when the engine is already initialized.

member.name: M:OFIQ.OFIQEngine.AssessQuality(System.String)
member.summary: Assesses the quality of a facial image from a file.
member.param: The path to the image file.
member.exception: Thrown when the engine is not initialized.
Thrown when the image path is invalid.

member.name: M:OFIQ.OFIQEngine.AssessQuality(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Assesses the quality of a facial image from a .
member.exception: Thrown when the engine is not initialized.
Thrown when the image is null.

member.name: M:OFIQ.OFIQEngine.GetVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the OFIQ native library.

member.name: M:OFIQ.OFIQEngine.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the OFIQ engine.
